info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 5:21PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tallahatchie, southeastern Quitman and southwestern Panola Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 521 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Crowder, or 13 miles southwest of Batesville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crowder, Pope, Courtland and Mims. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northwestern Mississippi.
